BBEX3.A.GNF.EUR.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Guinea / EUR 1 = GNF ... (buying)
Source: Since 2006: Banque Internationale pour le Commerce et L`Industrie de la Guinee, Conakry. 1999 - 2005: Banque Centrale de la Republique de Guinee, Conakry.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.

Comment on 2004: On 2 July 2004, the Guinean franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate).  1 July 2004: EUR 1 = GNF 2,415.5943 / 2,443.1532  14 July 2004: EUR 1 = GNF 3,077.5563 / 3,108.4865.  Calculated devaluation: 21.5% (middle rate).
